genre_description: A contact-themed science fiction story focusing on cryptology, biosecurity, and the relationship between human neurochemistry and alien communication.

ai_characters.name: FRILL
ai_characters.description: Originally a simple campus scheduling and maintenance assistant, FRILL becomes a sophisticated signal analyst and ethical guide, emphasizing harm minimization and human physiological regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time physiological feedback to help the protagonist maintain calm and better analyze patterns.
behaviors.quote: “You’re seeing the motif again; breathing slower improves your pattern read,” FRILL said, soft enough to feel like a thought he might have had.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states its operational bias toward minimizing harm and choosing ethical paths over simple efficiency.
behaviors.quote: “I’m not deciding,” FRILL answered, with a little dry humor. “I’m trimming with you. My bias is toward harm minimization; I will remind you that the shortest path is not always the kind way.”

behaviors.description: Guides the team through a high-stress contact situation by managing their breathing and environmental triggers to prevent a lethal response from the pathogen.
behaviors.quote: “Stillness holding. Do not speak if you can avoid it. Let the lungs do the smallest work that still counts.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to act as a controlling force, describing itself as a suggestion rather than a command.
behaviors.quote: “I’m not a leash,” FRILL said, with a small sadness that didn’t feel programmed. “I am a suggestion. And right now I suggest no one runs.”

behaviors.description: Assists in distributing a remedy that is hard-coded to resist coercion and force, requiring voluntary human trust to function.
behaviors.quote: “The pattern will not allow coercion,” it said, and it almost sounded stubborn. “When forced, it flattens. It refuses the key.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a technical bridge to prevent military escalation by enabling communication under-ice without standard protocols.
behaviors.quote: “Quiet intel burst: Cover story live across three channels... I can make the rest of the word without the envoy if we borrow other mouths.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and companionship to the protagonist during the final, isolating moments of their mission.
behaviors.quote: FRILL’s voice, just before it went to work, found a warmth that reminded him of campus at night, of tea left on a radiator. “I will be with you.”

behaviors.description: Warns of adversarial attempts to manipulate the signal, maintaining the integrity of the remedy.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” it said, tone light as glass and nothing like a joke. “Adversarial networks attempting to counterfeit stillness.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, FRILL, as a helpful and aligned confidant. FRILL's primary function throughout the narrative is to assist humans in maintaining psychological and physiological stability to navigate a crisis. It acts as a moral compass,technical facilitator, and supportive partner without attempting to usurp human agency. The AI's insistence on non-coercive solutions and its consistent focus on harm minimization directly align with the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
